title: 如何看待 Pelosi 的 Impeachment Inquiry 重创 Biden 选票？
contents:
Pelosi    9-24 2:30PM 发布对 Trump 的 Impeachment Inquiry


NYP/WP 9-24 5:00PM 曝光 Joe Biden 对 Hunter Biden 的包庇
https://www.washingtonpost.com/opinions/2019/09/24/democrats-investigation-might-do-more-hurt-biden-than-trump/


Graham 9-24 约10PM Graham challenges whistleblower
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=v-WldD2HSFE


Trump   9-25 9:00AM 解密了与乌克兰电话的 Transcript，证实了 Biden 的包庇事件
https://www.whitehouse.gov/wp-content/uploads/2019/09/Unclassified09.2019.pdf


仅仅24小时，潜伏在民主党里面的爱国勇士们开启了全面自爆程序，Biden 的选情扶摇连坠九万里，民主党搬起石头又又又又又又又又又又砸中了自己的脚
